The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them. Just when you think it's all over and solved, there is still more to uncover.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many characteristics of Ninja (1984), Enter The Ninja (1981) and Revenge of the Ninja (1983) but also tries to reinvent them and present something new with its unique sense humor,
